name: Army of One
description:
Army of One is a first person shooter game. Battle against other players in various modes from 1 on 1 to 32 on 32 and show that you or your team are the best one-man armies.

In army of one, from the casual player to the most professional player, they managed to have fun and find ways and challenges at their level.

With a ranked mode by rank and skill level you can face people of your own level to have fun and prove that you are the best.

Army of One also features both individual and team weekly tournaments in demolition mode, where you need to blow up the enemy base.

In army of one you can improve and customize your equipment, from your knife to your operator, with 9 operators available, each with a unique skill.

Come now to Army of one the new Free to play shooter and show your skill.
